verse: to tell the people of Israel that their land in Canaan would have the following borders:
Then Moses told the people, “You will receive the land inside these borders. It will be yours, but the Lord has commanded you to divide it among the nine and a half tribes.
The tribes of Reuben, Gad, and East Manasseh have already been given their land
across from Jericho, east of the Jordan River.”

header: The Leaders Who Will Divide the Land

verse: “Eleazar the priest and Joshua son of Nun will divide the land for the Israelites.
One leader from each tribe will help them,
and here is the list of their names:
These are the men the Lord commanded to help Eleazar and Joshua divide the land for the Israelites.
